content:
This article is about Chambers of Xeric reward. For relics in the Twisted League, see Twisted League#Relics.
Dark relic
Released5 January 2017 (Update)
MembersYes
Quest itemNo
Properties
TradeableNo
BankableNo
EquipableNo
StackableNo
OptionsCommune
DestroyAre you sure you wish to destroy it? You'll have to earn another in the Chambers of Xeric.
ExamineAn ancient object emanating a dark power.
Values
Value1 coin
High alch0 coins
Low alch0 coins
Weight1 kg
Advanced data
Item ID21027

The dark relic is a possible reward from the Chambers of Xeric. It has a Commune option which will result in the chat box stating A dark power emanates from the relic. You sense that this power can be directed.

Upon communing with the relic, the player may choose a skill in which to receive experience. If the chosen skill is one of the skills used in the Chambers of Xeric – combat skills, Mining, Woodcutting, Herblore, Farming, Hunter, Cooking, Fishing, Thieving, Firemaking or Agility – the player will receive 150 times their level in that skill as experience. If the chosen skill is not on this list, the player will instead only receive 50 times the corresponding skill level as experience. Construction is not included in the list of skills that receive an additional experience bonus, despite it being used to build storage units.

Item sources[edit | edit source]

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).
SourceLevelQuantityRarity
Chambers of XericN/A 12 × 1/33

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • An Ancient Relic can be found sitting on a table in the Library Historical Archive. Attempting to commune with the relic will cause Istoria to stop the player, stating that its power is being studied.
  • The relic appears to be a strange device contained in an orb, with an ogre artefact holding it.

[[File:Dark relic detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''dark relic''' is a possible reward from the [[Chambers of Xeric]]. It has a ''Commune'' option which will result in the chat box stating ''A dark power emanates from the relic. You sense that this power can be directed.''

Upon communing with the relic, the player may choose a [[Skills|skill]] in which to receive [[experience]]. If the chosen skill is one of the skills used in the Chambers of Xeric – [[combat]] skills, [[Mining]], [[Woodcutting]], [[Herblore]], [[Farming]], [[Hunter]], [[Cooking]], [[Fishing]], [[Thieving]], [[Firemaking]] or [[Agility]] – the player will receive 150 times their level in that skill as experience. If the chosen skill is not on this list, the player will instead only receive 50 times the corresponding skill level as experience. [[Construction]] is not included in the list of skills that receive an additional experience bonus, despite it being used to build [[storage unit]]s.

==Item sources==
{{Drop sources|Dark relic}}

==Trivia==
*An [[Ancient Relic]] can be found sitting on a table in the [[Library Historical Archive]]. Attempting to commune with the relic will cause [[Istoria]] to stop the player, stating that its power is being studied.
*The relic appears to be a [[strange device]] contained in an orb, with an [[ogre artefact]] holding it.
